com.map
Class MapNotesOverlay

java.lang.Object
  Overlay
      com.map.MapNotesOverlay

public class MapNotesOverlay
extends Overlay

This class is used to paint the user's notes on top of the map.

Author:
Juan Javier Garc√≠a, Aitor Martin, Andreas Kapouranis

Get the user's click location

Parameters:
mapView - the map view.
clickPoint - the point where the user clicked.
grps - groups to search.
Returns:
the selected group or null if the user did not click in a group
